name: Loco Locomotive (Wognum)
description:
Loco Locomotive is a game created in 8 days for the Experimental Game Design course, Uppsala University.  Goal of the assignment was to create a game in a week using a song a base. The song in question for the game is Crazy Train - Ozzy Osbourne. But since the song is copyrighted we have replaced the song so we can put it up here. You play as the conductor and only staff member on board the Loco Locomotive. Your goal is to make the train reach max speed before the timer runs out! Enjoy!

Made by:

Leo Wognum - Programming,  Graphics, Sound Design & Game Design

Desislava Atanasova -  Graphics, Sound Design & Game Design

Oliver Svensson - Project Management, Game Design & QA
